info.author: Karl Johan Kleist
info.description: Makes Plone into a CMS for the structured authoring tool `Arbortext Editor <http://www.ptc.com/products/arbortext/editor/>`_. Uses the Dexterity based content type 'XML Document' in the package 'das.xmldocument'.
info.name: das.xenion
info.summary: Plone integration with the XML authoring tool 'Arbortext Editor'
info.html_description: Makes Plone into a CMS for the structured authoring tool Arbortext Editor. Uses the Dexterity based content type ‘XML Document’ in the package ‘das.xmldocument’.
